title: fastq
description: A file containing sequencing reads with quality scores

header.description: A unique header, one for each fastq entry

seq.description: The sequence contained in this entry

qual.description: The quality scores (in fastq text format) associated with the sequence

qual_numeric_values.description: The direct numeric values corresponding to "qual" quality scores, non-transformed

error_probabilities.description: The probability of a base containing an error, as calculated from the qual scores (optional).

qual_offset.description: The offset of the ASCII value needed to calculate quality from ASCII quality scores (optional, assume 33 if not specified).
